dct_title_s: A chart of the world upon Mercator's projecton, shewing all the new discoveries to the present time with the tracks of the most distinguished navigators since the year 1700
dct_description_sm: compiled and published by A. Arrowsmith, Geographer.
Relief shown pictorially and by hachures.
Shows topography, drainage, shoals, islands, political boundaries.
Features routes, e.g.: Capt. Wallis in 1767.
dct_publisher_sm: published as the Act directs ... by A. Arrowsmith, Castle Street, Longacre,
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
